Text:
This hasnt been released with english dub yet so this is probably as good of a release as you'll get for now if your interested.

http://anidb.net/perl-bin/animedb.pl?show=anime&aid=4776&showallag=1

Devil May Cry follows the adventures of the demon hunter Dante who himself is half demon and half human. Dante is hired through his own business named "Devil May Cry". The characters are based off of the popular capcom playstation 2 games.

Good quality. Unfortunately, the series as a whole isn't very uniform due to the translation done by different subgroups. Also, note that the subs are hard-coded, meaning you cannot turn them off. This isn't a big issue but for some it might be.

Thanks for the upload.
